verbs.description: [ARG0: Iran 's supreme leader , Ayatollah Khamenei] , [V: took] [ARG1: a page] [ARG2: out of President Donald Trump 's book] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] , [ARGM-ADV: embarking on a wild tweetstorm in response to the US decision to pull out of his country 's nuclear deal] .

[ARG0: Iran 's supreme leader , Ayatollah Khamenei] , took a page out of President Donald Trump 's book Wednesday , [V: embarking] [ARG1: on a wild tweetstorm] [ARGM-PRP: in response to the US decision to pull out of his country 's nuclear deal] .

Iran 's supreme leader , Ayatollah Khamenei , took a page out of President Donald Trump 's book Wednesday , embarking on a wild tweetstorm in response to the US decision to [V: pull] out [ARG1: of his country 's nuclear deal] .
